articles.author: Dennis Romero
articles.title: California woman, 78, dies after vaccination, though no sign of link - NBC News
articles.description: A 78-year-old woman with a history of heart problems died after receiving a vaccination at Cal Poly Pomona in Los Angeles County, officials said Saturday.
articles.content:
A 78-year-old woman died shortly after being inoculated at a mass vaccination site in Los Angeles County, health officials announced Saturday, though there was no evidence the vaccine was at fault.
